title: Microsoft Toolkit 2.5.3 .Stable {2015}
description:
This is a set of tools and functions for managing licensing, deploying, and activating Microsoft Office and Windows. All output from these functions is displayed in the Information Console. All functions are run in the background and the GUI is disabled to prevent running multiple functions, as they could conflict or cause damage if run concurrently. The Microsoft Office Setup Customization Functions (Customize Setup Tab), AutoKMS Uninstaller (if AutoKMS is installed), AutoRearm Uninstaller (if AutoRearm is installed), Office Uninstaller and Product Key Checker work even if Microsoft Office or Windows is not installed / supported. For information about individual functions, see the program readme.

Changelog:
AutoKMS enables the Windows Event Log Service if it is disabled.
Changed TAP Adapter drivers for Windows 10 support.
Moved WinDivert folder to reduce delete errors.
Preliminary Windows 10 Tech Preview Support.
Reworked Windows Version detection.
Updated TaskScheduler Library.

Features:
KMS-activated,
install the product key
do rearm,
check the status of activation,
remove / install the KMS-service
make a backup copy of your license
remove Office (2003, 2007, 2010),
rapid transition from Windows Toolkit for Office Toolkit,
save settings activator
and much more ...

Information on how to activate:
EZ-Activator: This is a simple setting to activate the KMS. Unlike previous versions, it can not use the KMS-activated, if you are using a retail license. EZ-Activator gathers information about your state licensing to provide the best method of activation. It can automatically try to possible errors in the case of activation failure, and can undo all changes in the event of complete failure.
It automatically installs all KMS keys for your system attempts to activate only the license KMS, and if successful, sets AutoKMS automatically.

AutoKMS: AutoKMS scheduled task, which will be automatically extended for 180 days KMS activation. Unlike other activators KMS, AutoKMS not working 24/7 or only at the last minute in the hope he will not let you down, and leaves no trace, except for the scheduled tasks, journal and executable. He's just trying to activate KMS licenses (which saves a lot of time if you have not-KMS licenses such as MAK or Retail active). It will run at startup, and then every 24 hours and try to activate the specified number of times (task schedule can not be changed). Button Install / Uninstall used to install or remove AutoKMS.

AutoKMS custom task: Replace the default AutoKMS Scheduled tasks with user one that will not be reset. You can configure the triggers as you want in the Task Scheduler.

Activation:
1) Run this program as administrator
2) Bottom clicking on the program icon Windows (right), or Office (left)
3) Go to the tab "Activation"
4) Click "EZ-Activator" (highlighted in green)
5) All! everything will be all automatic.
6) Once activated, press "Uninstall" tab "Activation" under the label "Tool - AutoKMS"
Activator in the course of their work creates a virtual network adapter "TAP-Windows Adapter V9"
and connected to the Internet as a virtual, where checks and confirms
keys to activate the virtual server microsoft))))
Therefore, if in the course of the activation program will ask your permission to create or establish
adapter TAP-Windows Adapter V9 (query can be formulated differently - but the meaning is)
- Then let her do it!
and then later when the activator will work in computer properties appear inscription that
"Windows is activated" this virtual adapter can be safely removed by clicking "Uninstall"
You can, of course, not to do it if you can still be necessary for some reason,
but the scheduler each time you log on to reset it!
and why do you need an extra brake when starting?
7) To check the expiration date of activation on the same tab click "Check" - if someone really need)))

To activate, press the button - "EZ-Activator" and wait for reports that activation was successful
